# Frizzy

## Pronunciation

- /ˈfɹɪzi/

## Meanings

### Noun

A small amount of unkempt, curly hair

### Adjective

Formed of a mass of small, tight, wiry curls; unruly or extending in all directions.

> The wet weather made her hair frizzy and untidy.
